name: Ninja Run Game FREE
description:
Ninja Run Game Nice and amazing game mechanics. it's a game where your nin run and jump is move across various levels , Challenge your friends to who gets the highest

score.

- Change the direction that our ninjas Rolls

- Tap to make Ninja Jump

- Maximum effect, and go crazy on the multi-slice pomegranate.

- Avoid Blocks and hindrances by jumping over them

- Speed zone start

- causes our Ninja to do long jump like ninja fighting games

- collect coin to earn point

- 101 different Levels

- Phone and Tablet support

Challenge your friends, take your family members in this game action Track your progress

and keep moving!

The only thing you need to do in the game, if you are clicking on the screen, this sometimes

crazy :)

Download it today completely free. The controls are simple and intuitive thanks to

touch-based controls.
